column4: can anyone help me figure out why i've found two websites that wont load on my computer anymore?
your two websites are configured as virtual servers on apache/
no no, websites that i'm trying to goto, two i've found so far one is netscape.com  it comes up saying server not found
maybe you have a dns problem?
the thing is i know the site is working, when i goto terminal and do host netscape.com i get the ip's but when i ping it i get 100% packet loss
pings don't say much; the site administrator may have them blocked up
oh, do you have any suggestions to figure out what the problem is?
so; maybe you have proxy set up on your browser?
from a terminal, try to do: telnet site 80
says its unable to connect to host
maybe i did the command wrong? nc pepboys.com 80 ?
there is a way to use nc, but I don't know how
i just read something online saying that in order to use netcat the other computer needs to be setup to receive them...
want to just get me thing direct link for netscape so i can wget it? lol
